section_title:
33e05. Limited driving of certain automobiles and trucks by
17-year-olds.
text:
FLSA
§ 13(c)(6) provides an exemption for 17-year-olds, but not 16-year-olds, who,
as part of their employment, perform the occasional and incidental driving of
automobiles and trucks on public highways under specified conditions (see
FOH 33h02(d)(2)).
html: FLSA § 13(c)(6) provides an exemption for 17-year-olds, but not 16-year-olds, who, as part of their employment, perform the occasional and incidental driving of automobiles and trucks on public highways under specified conditions (see FOH 33h02(d)(2)).
